feed.title: yzzfo | Share for Free - Character Animation
feed.subtitle: 游戏开发学习资源分享

entry.title: Magic Animation Blend
entry.content:
A new way to blend animations in Unity.

WebGL Demo • Documentation • Demo Scene • Video Tutorial


THIS TOOL IS COMPATIBLE WITH UNITY 6.


💡 Break free from limitations!


Animator is great, but it is very limited when adding new content to your awesome game! Magic Blending sets you free from spaghetti animators by providing a smooth and modular way to blend animations in your game.


❔ How can I use it in my game?


Imagine you have a nice Animator Controller and need to add new weapons or items. With Magic Blending, you don't need to create new animations or modify your Animator Controller at all - just create a Magic Blend Asset and adjust the sliders!


Moreover, this plugin uses unique procedural blending, ensuring the final result is smooth and natural.


🌟 Sounds interesting? Here are some more details about Magic Blending


✔️ One animation, different poses

Forget about spaghetti animator controllers. Pick a weapon, item or stance pose you like and the plugin will procedurally animate it.


✔️ Next-gen blending

Dynamic additive blending ensures automated and smooth transitions between poses. Forget about setting up transitions for each state in the Animator!


✔️ It is incredibly simple

Very fast setup and no need for code knowledge. Perfect for artists and beginners!


✔️ Works with Animation States

Bind Magic Blends to the States, and the system will perfectly sync it with your animator controller.


✔️ Compatible with third-party plugins

Magic Blending enhances the animator controller, which means you can use it with any other package (e.g. Animation Riging).


✔️ Simple customization

Just tweak the sliders in runtime to control the blending. No need to restart the game.


✨Try the procedural animation magic and see the difference!

entry.title: Magic Animation Blend
entry.content:
在Unity中混合动画的新方法。

Try Free Demo • Documentation • Discord


😭 Unity有这个问题


Animator很棒，但它在扩展你出色的动画系统时非常有限！


想象一下，如果能够动态地利用现有的动画控制器来操控角色姿势。这种方式可以让你只需设置一次控制器，然后可以随时切换姿势！没有复杂的替代控制器或混乱的控制器结构——只有简洁且可扩展的架构。


🌟 这就是Magic Blending——将动画质量提升到新水平的简便方式。


✔️ 一个动画，不同的姿势


这可以节省大量时间和动画资源。告别混乱的过渡，享受干净且稳定的混合。



✔️ 它非常简单


创建一个Magic Blend资产，添加一个Magic Blend组件——就这么简单！简便且有效。



✔️ 支持动画状态


将Magic Blend绑定到状态，系统会完美地与动画控制器同步。



✔️ 高质量混合


你的角色再也不会看起来奇怪了。Magic Blending使用智能方法自然地动画化你的角色。



✔️ 简单的自定义


只需在运行时调整滑块即可控制混合。无需重新启动游戏。



✨听起来很酷吧？亲自试试，看看效果！

entry.title: Final IK
entry.content:
The final Inverse Kinematics solution for Unity.

What can I do with Final IK?

Take a look at over 30 (and counting) demo videos on YouTube.


What does it contain?

VRIK

Baker

Full Body Biped IK

Biped IK

CCD IK

Multi-effector FABRIK

Look-At IK

Aim IK

Arm IK

Leg IK

Limb IK

Rotation Limits

Grounder

Interaction System

+ 62 Demo scenes with example scripts for all components


How does it perform?

Desktop

Mobile

VR


Links

Publisher's Website


Support

Help, Community & Support Tickets

Online User Manual

Online Script Reference

Discord


E-mails

support@root-motion.com

contact@root-motion.com


What are your plans for the future?

Continue improving Final IK, it's documentation and add more features. I will be concentrating mostly on developing the Full Body IK and VR IK part of the package, based on Your feedback and practical use cases.


Anything else I should know before buying?

Make sure to read the Online User Manual about the components that interest you the most.

There is a section about the requirements and limitations of each component.


Looking forward to working together,

Partel Lang - developer of Final IK

entry.title: Final IK
entry.content:
The final Inverse Kinematics solution for Unity.
Unity 的最终逆向运动学解决方案。

更新 (1.9)：
1.9 版本对最终逆向运动学 (Final IK) 进行了很多修复和改进：

- 增加了烘焙器，这是一个强大的新工具，可将 IK 烘焙到 Humanoid、Generic 和 Legacy 动画剪辑中。
- 将 LOD 级别添加至 VRIK。
- 已在新版 Oculus Quest 硬件上测试 VRIK。
- 更新的文档。

请参阅发行说明来了解全部更新细节。
Final IK 1.9 与 PuppetMaster 0.9 和 Unity 2017/2018/2019 版本完全兼容。

我可以用 Final IK 做什么?
在 YouTube 上观看超过30个(还在不断增加)演示视频。

它包含了什么?
VRIK
烘焙器
全身双足 IK
双足 IK
CCD IK
多效果器 FABRIK（前后延伸反向运动学）
Look-At IK
Aim IK
Arm IK
Leg IK
Limb IK
旋转限制
Grounder
交互系统
CCDIKJ、AimIKJ - 基于 AnimationJobs 的多线程求解器
+ 62 个演示场景，所有组件均提供示例脚本

效果如何？
台式机
移动端
VR

技术概览
- 适用于 Humanoid、Generic 和 Legacy 动画类型
- 已在 Standalone、WebGL、IOS、Android 及所有 VR 平台（包括 Oculus Quest）上进行测试
- 包含完整的源代码
- 适用于每个组件的自定义可撤销检查器和场景视图手柄
- 警报系统可防止空引用和无效设置
- 性能得到极大优化
-模块化，易于扩展。制作自己的自定义角色设定
- HTML 文档、完整注释的代码和工具提示组件
- 已在大量角色上进行测试

链接
发布者的网站

Support
帮助、社区和支持请求
在线用户手册
在线脚本引用

电子邮件
support@root-motion.com
contact@root-motion.com

您未来的计划是什么？
继续改进 Final IK 和它的文档，并添加了更多功能。根据你的反馈和实际用例，我将大部分开发软件包的 Full Body IK 和 VR IK 部分。

在购买前我还应该知道什么？
确保从在线用户手册中阅读有关你最感兴趣的组件。

其中有一个环节介绍了每个组件的要求和局限性。


期待与您合作，
Partel Lang - Final IK 开发者

entry.title: Martial Arts Fight Game
entry.content:
Martial Arts Fight Game is included +187 anims

Update Note

2.31 - some animation names have been changed for easier use / Removed error and warning / added idle08 (2024/10/08)



Recommend

RPG Character / Main Character / FightGame

-

Dynamic Boxing bundle and Muaythai attack!!

It's not Heavy boxer type. It has lightweight style moving. faster and faster.




Features

  • Various Animation for Side-View & Side-Scrolling game
  • Dynamic Keyframe animation
  • Humanoid version included
  • Root motion and Inplace motion included
  • A T-pose included
  • FX is not included


Animation List

  • idle 13

  • movements 17
  • pick 3
  • revival 3
  • setmotion 2
  • sidescroll anims 14
  • slip 2
  • step 4
  • turn 2


Support

FAQ : https://www.wemakethegame.com

e-Mail : contact@wemakethegame.com

The best way to contact me is e-mail.

I always appreciate your great comments and feedback.

entry.title: Animation Designer
entry.content:
Innovative Animation Tweaking Tool For Unity Engine.Upgrade Animation Clips with procedural motion and bake it.Tweak Animation Clip pose and save it in new AnimationClip file.

✍ BEFORE YOU BUY:

! This is Editor Tool - No Playmode Required

! This tool is NOT dedicated for creating animations from zero point, it's for upgrading/adjusting already animated clips

! This tool is dedicated for humanoid creatures but you can still greatly improve animals/creatures animations (for more check tutorials)

! This tool works with all animation types as: Humanoid, Generic and Legacy

! This tool is dedicated for 3D Skeleton Animations

! This tool is generating new Animation Clips, that means there is no additional CPU/GPU weight, you can use generated clips for VR/Mobile just like any other animations.

! This tool is dedicated for body animations (NOT for detailed-multi bone face animations)

! This tool requires some animation knowledge to make best use on your models

! Tool works with all render pipelines, just the demo scene is using two standard materials to convert.



⚡ Innovative Animation Tweaking Tool For Unity Engine ⚡


Upgrade Animation Clips with additional procedural motion and bake it!

Tweak Animation Clip pose and save it in new AnimationClip file.

Set additional motion to some bones and save new AnimationClip for use as animation variant.



☄️ NO TOYING WITH KEYFRAMES OR TIMELINE!

Meet new workflow for tweaking animation!

All you need to do is using few sliders and curve window.


You don't need to be an Animation Artist to work with this tool.

If you're an Animation Artist, this tool will give you new possibilities!



? Maybe you bough package of some cool character but included animations quality is too low? Boost them easily with Animation Designer!


? You own lots of animation clips but you need one with arms rotated slightly different way?

Do it instantly with Animation Designer!


? Legs/Foot animation of your characters seems to be wrong?

Fix it in few clicks with Animation Designer!


? You own in-place attack animations but can't blend them correctly with run/walk animation?

Blend them together and adjust with Animation Designer's Morphing feature!



⚙️ Keep original animation intact!

Save modified animation as separated AnimationClip file.

Store designer animation settings for multiple animation clips, in single preset file, so you can go back for tweaking animations design, in any time!


No additional Data/Components!

Plugin is not generating any new component or data on character models you animate with Animation Designer. Keep your workspace clean and think about this plugin as core software element of the Unity Editor.


Package offers advanced IK analyze algorithms which can help you add some heavyness to walk / run animations.


You can use Animation Designer not only with characters but with any type of animated object.



⭐ Carefully designed window for maximum focus!

Window of Animation Designer is designed carefully to not overwhelm user with too many GUI elements on the screen.

You can switch to focus mode hiding even more windows, to fully focus just on the needed sliders and values.



⌛ Time Saver for Animators!

Prepare base animation without full polishing, let do it the procedural motion algorithm. Add some flappyness to small limbs and bake it.

Adjust Unity Humanoid animation retargeting errors inside editor.



⚙️ Custom Algorithms Ready!

Animation Designer Version 1.2.0 introduces new feature called "Custom Modules".

It allows to apply custom procedural animation algorithms during design process.

Version 1.2.0 delivers modules for humanoid fists, fingers, arms, spine, head and legs posing and the "Strafe Creator" module (applied to generic rig too) to help out creating 8 directional movement out of single walk / run animation clip.



Community Forum Thread


User Manual


Our Discord for Support




Package works on all SRPs! It's not shader related package.

(You just need to covert standard Demo materials for demo examples)

Built In ✅ LWRP ✅ URP ✅ HDRP ✅ Custom RP ✅

entry.title: Animation Designer
entry.content:
创新的Unity引擎动画调整工具。升级动画剪辑，添加程序化运动并进行烘焙。调整动画剪辑姿势并将其保存为新的AnimationClip文件。

✍ 购买前请注意：

！这是编辑器工具 - 不需要播放模式

！此工具并不专门用于从零开始创建动画，而是用于升级/调整已经动画化的剪辑

！此工具专为类人形生物设计，但您仍然可以大幅改善动物/生物的动画（更多信息请查看教程）

！此工具适用于所有动画类型，如：类人形、通用和遗留

！此工具专为3D骨骼动画设计

！此工具生成新的Animation Clips，这意味着没有额外的CPU/GPU负担，您可以像使用其他动画一样使用生成的剪辑进行VR/移动设备。

！此工具专用于身体动画（不适用于详细的多骨骼面部动画）

！此工具需要一定的动画知识以便在您的模型上获得最佳效果

！工具适用于所有渲染管线，仅演示场景使用了两种标准材质进行转换。

⚡ 创新的Unity引擎动画调整工具 ⚡

升级动画剪辑，添加额外的程序化运动并进行烘焙！

调整动画剪辑姿势并将其保存为新的AnimationClip文件。

为某些骨骼设置额外的运动并保存新的AnimationClip作为动画变体。

☄️ 不再玩弄关键帧或时间线！

迎接新的动画调整工作流程！

您只需使用几个滑块和曲线窗口即可完成所有操作。


您不需要成为动画艺术家就可以使用这个工具。

如果您是动画艺术家，这个工具将为您提供新的可能性！

? 也许您购买了一些很酷的角色，但包含的动画质量太低？轻松使用动画设计师提升它们的质量！

? 您拥有很多动画片段，但需要一个手臂稍微旋转不同的动画？

使用动画设计师立即实现！

? 您的角色的腿/脚动画似乎不正确？

用动画设计师轻松修复，只需几次点击！

? 您拥有原地攻击动画，但无法与跑步/行走动画正确混合？

将它们混合在一起，并使用动画设计师的变形功能进行调整！

⚙️ 保持原始动画不变！

将修改后的动画保存为单独的AnimationClip文件。

将设计师的动画设置存储在单个预设文件中，以便于多个动画片段使用，这样您可以随时返回调整动画设计！

无需额外的数据/组件！

插件不会在您使用动画设计师动画的角色模型上生成任何新的组件或数据。保持您的工作区整洁，并将此插件视为Unity编辑器的核心软件元素。

该包提供先进的IK分析算法，可以帮助您为行走/跑步动画增加一些重量感。

您不仅可以将动画设计师用于角色，还可以用于任何类型的动画对象。


⭐ 精心设计的窗口以最大化专注！

动画设计师的窗口经过精心设计，以避免用户在屏幕上被过多的GUI元素所淹没。

您可以切换到专注模式，隐藏更多窗口，完全专注于所需的滑块和数值。

⌛ 为动画师节省时间！

准备基础动画，无需完全打磨，让程序运动算法来处理。为小肢体添加一些抖动效果并进行烘焙。

在编辑器中调整Unity人形动画重定向错误。

⚙️ 自定义算法已准备好！

动画设计师版本1.2.0引入了名为“自定义模块”的新功能。

它允许在设计过程中应用自定义程序动画算法。

版本1.2.0提供了用于人形拳头、手指、手臂、脊柱、头部和腿部姿势的模块，以及“侧移创建器”模块（也适用于通用骨架），帮助从单个行走/奔跑动画剪辑中创建8方向的移动。

社区论坛帖子

用户手册

我们的Discord支持

该包适用于所有SRP！这不是与着色器相关的包。

（您只需将标准演示材料转换为演示示例）

内置 ✅ LWRP ✅ URP ✅ HDRP ✅ 自定义RP ✅
